St._Louis.Clifton Heights, St. Louis:
Clifton Heights is a neighborhood of St. Louis, Missouri, US, located along the southwest border of the city and highlighted by a park — Clifton Park (38.6143°N 90.2916°W﻿ / 38.6143; -90.2916﻿ (Clifton Park)) — with a playground and a lake.
The neighborhood is mostly residential, with a history dating back to the early 19th century and houses of varying architectural styles, including some Victorian and numerous Arts and Crafts homes.
